Vasili went on, testily pushing away a little table without looking at 
1 Catherine. 
her. "You know, Catiche, that wg you three sisters, Mdmontov, and my wife are the count's only direct heirs. I know, I know how hard it is for you to talk or think of such matters. It is no easier for me; but, my dear, I am getting on for sixty and must be prepared for anything. Do you know I have sent for Pierre? The count," pointing to his portrait, "definitely demanded that he should be called."
